title: Man Killed Following Shooting In Franklin
content:
FRANKLIN, La.
UPDATE 12:45: Franklin Police have arrested a 15 year old teen for 1st degree murder.
He is accused of killing a 16 year old around 3:50pm on Augustine Maze St.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A man is dead following a fatal shooting in Franklin.
The Franklin Police Department received a complaint of shots fired in the area of Augustine Maze Rd just before 4:00pm.
There were officers in the area at the time and located one male victim.
The department says they are in the early stages of the investigation, the Franklin Police Department, with the assistance of the St. Mary Parish Sheriff's Office, are still examining the crime scene and conducting interviews.
The victim's name is being withheld at this time until the family is notified.
He has also been turned over to the St. Mary Parish Coroner's Office.
